content.question: Which of the following is likely to occur as a result when Congress refuses to act as a check on the power of the president, according to the main idea of the passage?

choices.label: The Supreme Court will intervene to check the power of the president.
The American people will vote in new members of Congress during the next election.
The president will be able to push the limits of constitutional authority.
Treaties, such as the Geneva Conventions, will be treated as executive agreements.

content.answer: The president will be able to push the limits of constitutional authority.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Describe the argument, perspective, evidence, and reasoning presented in the source.
